author: natnael
title: ስለ ካርዳኖ - CARDANO AMHARIC PODCAST
description: La communauté éthiopienne ne dispose pas d'un aperçu de toutes les possibilités offertes par la blockchain Cardano.

f6_assessments.q0: L'idée correspond bien aux objectifs de ce défi, puisqu'il entend créer une série de contenus audio en langue amharique, dans le but de diffuser des sujets relatifs à l'écosystème Cardano auprès des natifs d'Éthiopie. L'auteur nous donne un bref compte-rendu d'un projet qu'il est déjà en train de mettre en pratique. Si j'ai bien compris, il s'agit de réunions en face à face dans un lieu appelé clubhouse, dont l'ordre du jour principal est de discuter de Cardano et de Blockchain. C'est très intéressant, car cela montre l'implication de l'auteur pour la cause, avant même de recevoir un financement. Cependant, j'ai quelques observations à faire. Tout d'abord, l'auteur affirme dès le début de la proposition que "l'un des projets les plus influents au monde, en fait, l'un des projets emblématiques de Cardano sera réalisé en partenariat avec l'Éthiopie". D'accord, mais de quel projet s'agit-il ? Il serait très important que l'auteur clarifie cette question afin que les personnes extérieures, qui n'ont aucun contact avec ce projet ou les participants locaux dans le pays, qui ont plus de chance de le connaître, puissent comprendre ce qui est dit ici. Une autre chose que j'ai remarquée est la partie où il dit que la population éthiopienne est plus susceptible d'accéder au contenu audio qu'au contenu écrit sur les sites web, qu'il a fait des études et des recherches et qu'il est arrivé à cette conclusion. J'aimerais qu'il argumente cela, qu'il explique quelles ont été ses recherches, quelles données il a recueillies, comment il est arrivé à cette conclusion, etc. En dehors de ces questions, je pense que oui, la proposition est de grande valeur et aura un impact positif sur la question de l'apport de connaissances sur Cardano aux locuteurs d'autres langues.
f6_assessments.q1: Ici, nous avons une bonne idée de qui ferait quoi grâce à la rubrique "rôles et tâches". Je trouve que la façon dont l'équipe organise ces informations est très directe et satisfaisante, car nous pouvons clairement visualiser quel professionnel serait responsable de quelle partie du projet. Cependant, une chose extrêmement importante n'a pas été faite ici, qui serait la présentation de l'équipe. Nous ne connaissons pas leurs noms, le domaine d'activité de chacun, un bref historique de leur travail jusqu'à présent et leur relation avec l'écosystème Cardano. Avoir ces informations serait essentiel pour transmettre une plus grande certitude que l'équipe est capable de développer ce projet. Je pense que certaines informations sur le processus lui-même manquaient également, par exemple : quelle est la durée moyenne des enregistrements ? Quels sujets, plus précisément, seraient couverts, et dans quel ordre ? Qui seraient ces professionnels qui seraient invités ? J'aurais aimé qu'il donne plus de détails sur le contenu lui-même, au-delà de la nécessité de sa création et de l'impact qu'il aurait sur la communauté éthiopienne. En ce qui concerne les dépenses, cette partie de la proposition était très détaillée, nous savons comment le montant de 3500 USD (un montant modeste par rapport à ce que la plupart des propositions demandent comme financement) sera utilisé. La répartition est très juste et réaliste, mais il m'a manqué le paiement des personnes impliquées. Par exemple, qui présentera le podcast, l'invité spécial, ces personnes ne seront-elles pas rémunérées ? Pour ces raisons, je pense que la proposition manque de plus de détails, afin de mieux comprendre le processus de création du podcast, de mieux connaître les auteurs de la proposition et d'obtenir plus de détails sur le contenu généré.
f6_assessments.q2: L'auteur fixe des indicateurs clés de performance (KPI) grâce auxquels nous pouvons contrôler si les objectifs sont atteints. Il serait intéressant qu'il prépare un rapport mensuel mettant en évidence les données citées dans ces KPI et qu'il l'envoie à la communauté, qu'il expose lors d'un Town Hall les conséquences de son projet, c'est-à-dire qu'il fasse savoir au reste de la communauté ce qui se passe dans la localité et les réactions que reçoit votre podcast. Je considère qu'il s'agit d'une simple proposition d'auditabilité, ce qu'il faut faire c'est vraiment garder le contact avec l'auteur, peut-être que quelqu'un qui parle amharique et qui fait déjà partie de la communauté Cardano peut écouter le podcast et établir un pont avec l'auteur, pour donner des suggestions et aussi pour pouvoir nous garantir (à nous qui ne parlons pas amharique) que le contenu est construit comme promis. Il est également nécessaire de suivre la campagne de marketing de ce projet, car à mon avis c'est une clé du succès, puisque l'objectif principal serait d'impliquer les habitants du pays avec des connaissances relatives à Cardano et de les rendre plus préparés et intéressés à adhérer aux projets qui y seront développés dans le futur. C'est pourquoi il est essentiel de s'assurer que le contenu leur parviendra, que chaque podcast sera largement diffusé. Donc, je crois que l'auteur nous a fourni un contenu à surveiller, je suggère qu'il y ait ce genre de feedback de sa part (j'ai mentionné des idées comme un rapport écrit ou la participation à un townhall), et aussi le suivi d'un certain membre de la communauté qui est un locuteur de la langue en question.

f6_assessments.q0: The problem of the Ethiopian community losing the opportunities that Cardano offers was described and as a solution, the creation of an Amharic audio content about Cardano was presented. This proposal has the potential to have a great impact on the community since, as explained by the proposer, few Ethiopians speak English and therefore do not have access to information about Cardano. This proposal is in line with the challenge as it intends to attract non-English speakers to the Cardano community.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer does not present evidence of his experiences, which would be important to check the project's viability. The budget has been detailed and appears to be reasonable for the work to be carried out. The proposer does not identify who are the other members who will work on the project despite describing their functions and tasks. A roadmap with milestones is also not presented, which would be important for evaluating the feasibility of the proposal. The proposal does not appear to have greater risks for its implementation.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal clearly presents the target problem and its solution. A roadmap with milestones is not provided, which would be important for monitoring and evaluating the progress of the work. KPIs were provided that are important for evaluating the success of the proposal. Still, a roadmap with milestones would be essential for evaluation and should be contained in the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem needing to be solved been identified and articulated namely that the Ethiopian community is missing an overview of all the opportunities that Cardano blockchain offers. It is clear that this proposal falls within the scope of the challenge brief by providing Amharic audio content for the people in Ethiopia, explaining Cardano blockchain. 
This proposal shows clearly how it adds value to the Cardano system as it would enable  Ethiopians to understand everything about Cardano and the opportunities it presents. Key metrics are clear, reasonable and realistic. THese include  Number of Episodes, how many viewers, how much feedback from the community, how many subscriptions, how many comments, how many members of the community. 
The key metrics and goals of the proposal fall within the scope of the challenge.Proposal can scale to address future challenges by increasing the numbers of engagementss, and abovementioned key metrics. This project will have a positive impact on Cardano system by increasing the awareness and trust  among Ethiopians to listen to and participate in the podcast thereby increasing knowledge on Cardano.

I have given this proposal a 4 star rating because it has gone into great detail and shown a realistic and reasonable understanding of the scope of work as well as a very reasonable budget.


If this does not receive funding for whatever reason, one way proposer can improve it is by continuing to build and send press releases to media of your country or social media relating to your subject. Sometimes that one step might motivate someone to view the link and add credibility for your project and give him a better idea on the project which enables him to vote for the project. 

You can also look more into developing a contingency plan if for any reason your original plan does not work out. This planning is very favorable when CAs and voters consider proposals since more often than not, what we think will happen wont happen but some complication or issue will arise.

I am qualified to write this assessment based on being a translator since 1992 at the State Broadcasting Corporation as well as since that time,running my own translation agency, working with the two native languages of my country as well as working on various translation projects into other languages, including translation, transcription and proofreading.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer has   provided evidence  of himself  where he is a managing the local Cardano Community on telegram and having Clubhouse discussions  . He has not included his LinkedIn profile. There are no links to verify. I feel based on prior experience that the proposer is competent to build this podcast.  
The proposal  gives no details of other partners. 
He has provided the team structure of partners who he would work with such as experts, developers etc
The budget has  been outlined clearly and broken down into identifiable items. Clear costs have been given for the various hosting fees on platforms and marketing campaign costs as well as podcast apps.   

The budget is  very reasonable to achieve the set goals.  The proposer has not provided a verifiable plan if additional funding is required. 
There is no plan for additional funding  if objectives are not met. 

The timetable is realstic to build the site and related publications.
The proposal  does  provide  a sensible and conductible plan for implementation. It has a very practical plan with detailed breakdown in terms of the various stages of site production. 

Resources  necessary to implement the proposal are well described.   
The proposal has technical aspects which have been addressed. The proposer has not identified risks in this proposal.  Given the  producers' experience and plan presented it is likely this proposal will be implemented successfully. A piece of advice... You can also look more into developing a contingency plan if for any reason your original plan does not work out. This planning is very favorable when CAs and voters consider proposals since more often than not, what we think will happen wont happen but some complication or issue will arise. A proposer who has considered this, would be looked on more favorably since it shows that they are prepared for various situations and eventualities


Given experience and plan presented it is highly likely this proposal will be implemented successfully hence I have given a 4 star rating
f6_assessments.q2:
There is a clear roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement. 
There are  clearly defined Metrics/KPIs that define the success of the proposal  they could define number of subscribers, number of podcast episodes created , how many comments and interaction from the community, no of feedback comments.

There is a clear understandable description of the targeted problem. 
The proposer has not identified possible hurdles, challenges and difficulties.
 The information provided may be  sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal. 

Nonetheless one piece of advice for the proposer.  Make as many metrics which you can track easily. Use Trello or Notion or some similar project management tool.
The information provided is not sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal hence i have given a 3  star rating.

f6_assessments.q2: The key milestones and the budget breakdown are effectively communicated Probably, the budget requested is underestimating the marketing item in terms of allocation.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer/s want to turn their clubhouse meetings into and audio so more people can listen to them. They have a good plan for their success as well as an explained budget.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal has a well written plan explaining what they have been doing and how they want to change it to an audio recording. They also have great experience in this area as they have already been doing this but they want to make it and audio so more people can access it.
f6_assessments.q2: It will be easy to audit because all the information about it is there. They have a plan and picture of what success would be. Something that would add to it next time would be to add a timeline or possibly some more details of how many audio files they want to make.

f6_assessments.q0: This is a great idea for Ethiopia. The proposal clearly emphasizes the problem and offers a great solution. If Cardano had its own audio content to educate people about Cardano, blockchain in general that would certainly have a big impact and add value to the Cardano ecosystem. The KPIs indicated in the proposal match the ones indicated in the challenge and proposal is able to scale and address future challenges.
f6_assessments.q1: Unfortunately we do not have any account of what experience and skill will be necessary to deliver to the proposal. Also proposer didn't provided evidence (references, links,) of relevant skills and experience needed to implement the proposal. Unfortunately, the proposal does not mention the team of people who would work on this project. The budget is clearly presented and reasonable and lets us know how the money will be allocated for equipment purchases, advertising, hosting platforms, but we do not have a clear insight into who will run the podcast and for how much money. The idea is great and great to present but lacks a detailed implementable plan. In the proposal are mentioned actionable tasks and order of execution, technical aspects but needs to be further elaborated. The proposal lists the necessary resources with which to implement the project, but unfortunately it is not defined realistic timetable to complete the work. Possible risks are also not mentioned and in the proposal we can't find information on risks and how to deal with them if they arise.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal does not define a roadmap with milestones and time frames for achievement. KPIs that define the success of the proposal are presented and can be used to quantify the success of the project. A project like this when realized could give the community chance to track the progress.

solution: Nous créons du contenu audio en amharique pour les habitants de l'Éthiopie, en expliquant la blockchain Cardano.
experience:
- Gestion de la communauté locale de Cardano sur Telegram
- Hôte des discussions hebdomadaires du Clubhouse sur la blockchain
- Commercialisateur, podcasteur, développeur
